entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape and Yaxley sped toward the front door, which swung inward at their approach. The eyes of the pale-faced portraits on the walls followed Snape and Yaxley as they strode past.

entities.name: yaxley
entities.description: Snape and Yaxley sped toward the front door, which swung inward at their approach. The eyes of the pale-faced portraits on the walls followed Snape and Yaxley as they strode past.

entities.name: fountain
entities.description: Somewhere in the dark garden beyond the hedge a fountain was playing.

entities.name: hallway
entities.description: The hallway was large, dimly light, and sumptuously decorated, with a magniﬁcent carpet covering most of the stone ﬂoor.

entities.name: portraits
entities.description: The eyes of the pale-faced portraits on the walls followed Snape and Yaxley as they strode past.

entities.name: drawing room
entities.description: The drawing room was full of silent people, sitting at a long and ornate table.

The eyes of the pale-faced portraits on the walls followed Snape and Yaxley as they strode past.
